title: Toggle Non-Lethal Attacks
content:
en you engage in combat with any merchant NPC or enemy, try using this. Killing them would only drop designated item drops but if you knock them unconscious, it will allow you to loot their entire inventory, including any items you may have previously sold or traded with them. Notes & Tips go here.
